summary.span: 表示 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別物件的命令提供容器。The class object provides the container for the commands of an . 存取的屬性擷取物件。Accessing the property of an retrieves an object. 應用程式可以透過程式設計方式新增或移除命令。An application can programmatically add or remove commands. 類別會實作介面透過類別。The class implements the interface through the class. ## Examples 如需完整範例，請參閱概觀。For a complete example, see the overview.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不適用於唯讀介面。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 您可以使用套用這個方法的所有類別的方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，方法集合清除集合中的所有樣式。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection. 針對，它會清除集合中的所有選項。For the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 將欄位加入至欄位的物件清單的變更資料繫結控制項的行為，並要求您再次將資料繫結至控制項。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

span.span: Introduction to the ObjectList Control
